title: Hadley v. Baxendale
summary: Established the rule for damages in contract cases - damages must be reasonably foreseeable
principles: Damages must arise naturally from breach

title: Carlill v. Carbolic Smoke Ball Co.
summary: Established that advertisements can constitute binding unilateral offers
principles: Consideration can be found in performance

title: Donoghue v. Stevenson
summary: Established the modern concept of negligence
principles: Duty of care exists between manufacturer and consumer
